description:
cmd/ld: add .note.GNU-stack section for external linking
Fixes issue 5392.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a5b289c0f5fb ***

cmd/ld: add .note.GNU-stack section for external linking
Fixes issue 5392.

R=iant, r
CC=golang-dev

Hello iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

Thanks for working on this.

I think this is good for 1.1 but please wait for r.
